mapper.update: INSERT INTO mng_log_user_info(gid, user_id, user_nm, ogdp_dep_cd, ogdp_dep_nm, log_dt) SELECT nextval('mng_log_user_info_gid_seq'), logon_id as user_id, user_name, pos_id as dept_id, dept_name || ' ' || section_name as dept_name, now() FROM organ_view WHERE LOGON_ID=#{loginId};

INSERT INTO mng_log_menu_info (menu_cd, menu_nm, lwrt_menu_cd, lwrt_menu_nm, user_id, user_nm, ogdp_dep_cd, ogdp_dep_nm, log_dt) SELECT a.menu_cd, a.menu_name, a.sub_menu_code, a.sub_menu_name, b.logon_id as user_id, b.user_name, b.pos_id as dept_id, b.dept_name || ' ' || b.section_name as dept_name, now() FROM ( SELECT menu_cd, coalesce((select menu_nm from mngr_menu_mng where lwrt_menu_cd = (select menu_cd from mngr_menu_mng where lwrt_menu_cd=#{menuCode}) ), menu_nm) as menu_name,
lwrt_menu_cd as sub_menu_code, menu_nm as sub_menu_name FROM mngr_menu_mng WHERE lwrt_menu_cd = #{menuCode} ) a, organ_view b WHERE b.logon_id = #{loginId};
mapper.select: select min(to_char(LOG_DT, 'YYYY-MM')) as min, max(to_char(LOG_DT, 'YYYY-MM')) as max from mng_log_menu_info;

SELECT sum(cnt) AS total FROM ( select a.lwrt_menu_cd as sub_menu_code, b.menu_link as menu_link, a.lwrt_menu_nm as sub_menu_name, count(1) as cnt from mng_log_menu_info a, mngr_menu_mng b where 1=1 AND to_char(a.log_dt, 'YYYYMM') = #{startDate} AND a.lwrt_menu_cd = b.lwrt_menu_cd AND a.lwrt_menu_cd in('MENU_00001', 'MENU_00004', 'MENU_00005', 'MENU_00050', 'MENU_00057', 'MENU_00051', 'MENU_00056', 'MENU_00052', 'MENU_00053', 'MENU_00058') group by a.lwrt_menu_cd, a.lwrt_menu_nm, b.menu_link order by cnt desc, a.lwrt_menu_cd, a.lwrt_menu_nm ) a

SELECT sum(cnt) AS total FROM ( select a.lwrt_menu_cd as sub_menu_code, b.menu_link as menu_link, a.lwrt_menu_nm as sub_menu_name, count(1) as cnt from mng_log_menu_info a, mngr_menu_mng b where 1=1 AND a.lwrt_menu_cd = b.lwrt_menu_cd AND a.lwrt_menu_cd in('MENU_00001', 'MENU_00004', 'MENU_00005', 'MENU_00050', 'MENU_00057', 'MENU_00051', 'MENU_00056', 'MENU_00052', 'MENU_00053', 'MENU_00058') group by a.lwrt_menu_cd, a.lwrt_menu_nm, b.menu_link order by cnt desc, a.lwrt_menu_cd, a.lwrt_menu_nm ) a

select a.lwrt_menu_cd as sub_menu_code, b.menu_link as menu_link, a.lwrt_menu_nm as sub_menu_name, count(1) as cnt from mng_log_menu_info a, mngr_menu_mng b where 1=1 AND to_char(a.log_dt, 'YYYYMM') = #{startDate} and a.lwrt_menu_cd = b.lwrt_menu_cd and a.lwrt_menu_cd in('MENU_00001', 'MENU_00004', 'MENU_00005', 'MENU_00050', 'MENU_00057', 'MENU_00051', 'MENU_00056', 'MENU_00052', 'MENU_00053', 'MENU_00058') group by a.lwrt_menu_cd, a.lwrt_menu_nm, b.menu_link order by cnt desc, a.lwrt_menu_cd, a.lwrt_menu_nm
select sum(cnt) as visitor from ( select count(DISTINCT user_id) as cnt from mng_log_user_info where 1=1 group by user_id, to_char(LOG_DT, 'yyyymmdd') ) a
select sum(cnt) as visitor_cnt from ( select count(user_id) as cnt from mng_log_user_info where 1=1 group by user_id ) a

select a.lwrt_menu_cd as sub_menu_code, b.menu_link as menu_link, a.lwrt_menu_nm as sub_menu_name, count(1) as cnt from mng_log_menu_info a, mngr_menu_mng b where 1=1 and to_char(a.log_dt, 'YYYYMM') = #{startDate} and a.lwrt_menu_cd =b.lwrt_menu_cd and a.lwrt_menu_cd != 'MENU_00002'
and lwrt_menu_cd = #{subMenuCode}
and a.user_nm like #{searchServiceUserInfo}||'%'
and a.menu_cd not in('MENU_00003', 'MENU_00006', 'MENU_00007', 'MENU_00008', 'MENU_00009', 'MENU_00010', 'MENU_00011', 'MENU_00012', 'MENU_00013', 'MENU_00014', 'MENU_00015', 'MENU_00016', 'MENU_00017', 'MENU_00018', 'MENU_00019') group by a.lwrt_menu_cd, a.lwrt_menu_nm, b.menu_link order by cnt desc, a.lwrt_menu_cd, a.lwrt_menu_nm
